title: "Comparison of Two Means"
format: html
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)

SEM <- function(x) {
  sd(x) / sqrt(length(x))
}

```

```{r}
set.seed(3575575)

Alive <- rnorm(n = 150, mean = 24.5, sd = 2.6)
Dead <- rnorm(n = 30, mean = 22.0, sd = 2.7)
Group <- c(rep("Alive", 150), rep("Dead", 30))

HL <- tibble(Horn_Length = c(Alive, Dead), Group = factor(Group))

HL |>
  ggplot(aes(Horn_Length)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30, fill = "#6695DE") +
  facet_grid(Group ~ .) +
  labs(x = "Horn Length (mm)", y = "Count")

HL |>
  group_by(Group) |>
  summarize(
    n = length(Horn_Length),
    Horn_mean = mean(Horn_Length),
    Horn_sd = sd(Horn_Length),
    Horn_SEM = SEM(Horn_Length)
  )

mod <- lm(Horn_Length ~ Group, data = HL)
summary(mod)
```
